SEARCH
Package com.serezk4.io.socket.client

Record Class ClientConfiguration

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
com.serezk4.io.socket.client.ClientConfiguration
Record Components:
host - the server hostname or IP address (cannot be null or blank)
port - the server port number (must be in the range 1-65535)
bufferSize - the buffer size for data transfer (must be greater than 0)
public record ClientConfiguration(String host, int port, int bufferSize) extends Record
Configuration for the Client.

This record defines the essential settings required for the client to connect to the server. It includes the server host, port, and buffer size for data transfer.

Since:
1.0

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientConfiguration

      public ClientConfiguration(String host, int port, int bufferSize)
      Constructs a ClientConfiguration with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      host - the server hostname or IP address
      port - the server port number
      bufferSize - the buffer size for data transfer
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if host is null or blank, port is not in the range 1-65535, or bufferSize is less than or equal to 0

      The representation includes the host, port, and buffer size in a readable format.
